title: Asian Temples Quiz
description: How well do you remember Asia's most magnificent temples? Test your recall of these sacred architectural wonders.

questions.question: Angkor Wat, the largest religious monument in the world, is located in which Southeast Asian country?
The Golden Temple (Harmandir Sahib), the holiest shrine of Sikhism, is located in which Indian city?
Borobudur, a massive Buddhist temple with over 500 Buddha statues, is found on which Indonesian island?
The Fushimi Inari Shrine, famous for its thousands of vermillion torii gates, is located in which Japanese city?
Which Buddhist temple in Thailand is known as the Temple of the Emerald Buddha and sits within the Grand Palace complex?
The Tiger's Nest Monastery (Paro Taktsang) clings to a cliff face in which Himalayan country?
Prambanan, a 9th-century Hindu temple compound, is located in which country?
Which ancient temple complex in Myanmar features over 2,000 Buddhist monuments spread across a vast plain?
The Meiji Shrine, surrounded by a forest of 120,000 trees, is located in which major Asian city?
Wat Rong Khun, known as the White Temple for its dazzling white exterior, is located in which Thai province?
The Temple of Heaven, where emperors prayed for good harvests, is located in which Chinese city?
Which famous golden Buddhist pagoda in Myanmar is said to enshrine strands of the Buddha's hair?
The Lotus Temple, shaped like a blooming lotus flower, is a Bahá'í House of Worship located in which city?
Kinkaku-ji, also known as the Golden Pavilion, is a Zen Buddhist temple in which Japanese city?
The Shore Temple, a UNESCO World Heritage Site built by the Pallava dynasty, overlooks the Bay of Bengal in which Indian state?
